languages.text: "И все-таки..." {n}Маражай улыбается — но не победоносно и не с издевкой, как обычно, а почти что устало.{/n} "И все-таки я был прав насчет Иремерисс и мон-кай. Я был прав с самого начала".
"So in the end..." {n}Marazhai's smile is not his usual triumphant and scornful one. He looks almost tired.{/n} "In the end, I was right about Yremeryss and the mon-keigh. I was right all along."
languages.original_text: "И все-таки..." {n}Маражай улыбается — но не победоносно и не с издевкой, как обычно, а почти что устало.{/n} "И все-таки я был прав насчет Иремерисс и мон-кай. Я был прав с самого начала".

traits.locale_text: "So in the end..." {n}Marazhai's smile isn't his usual triumphant and scornful one. It's almost weary.{/n} "In the end, I was right about Yremeryss and the mon-keigh. I was right all along."
"So in the end..." {n}Marazhai's smile isn't his usual triumphant and scornful one. It's almost weary.{/n} "In the end, I was right about Yremeryss and the mon-keigh. I was right all along."

"So in the end..." {n}Marazhai's smile is not his usual triumphant and scornful one. He looks almost tired.{/n} "In the end, I was right about Yremeryss and the mon-keigh. I was right all along."

languages.text: «Al final...». {n}La sonrisa de Marazhai carece de su habitual triunfalismo y desdén. Casi parece cansado.{/n} «Al final, tenía razón sobre Yremeryss y los mon-keigh. Tenía toda la razón».
languages.original_text: "So in the end..." {n}Marazhai's smile is not his usual triumphant and scornful one. He looks almost tired.{/n} "In the end, I was right about Yremeryss and the mon-keigh. I was right all along."

traits.locale_text: «Y al final...». {n}La sonrisa de Marazhai carece de su habitual triunfalismo y desdén. Está prácticamente agotado.{/n} «Al final, tenía razón sobre Yremeryss y los mon-keigh. Tenía toda la razón».

languages.text: « Alors, finalement... » {n}Le sourire de Marazhai n'est pas aussi triomphant et méprisant que d'habitude. Il semble presque las.{/n} « Finalement, j'avais raison au sujet d'Yremeryss et {mf|du|de la} mon-keigh. J'avais raison depuis le début. »
languages.original_text: "So in the end..." {n}Marazhai's smile is not his usual triumphant and scornful one. He looks almost tired.{/n} "In the end, I was right about Yremeryss and the mon-keigh. I was right all along."

traits.locale_text: « Alors, finalement... » {n}Le sourire de Marazhai n'est pas aussi triomphant et méprisant que d'habitude. Il semble presque las.{/n} « Finalement, j'avais raison au sujet d'Yremeryss et {mf|du|de la} mon-keigh. J'avais raison depuis le début. »

languages.text: 「で、結局は…」{n}マラズハイの笑顔は、いつもの勝ち誇り、軽蔑するようなものとは異なっていた。少し疲れているように見える。{/n}「結局は、イレメリスとモン＝ケイについては、俺の言ってることが正しかったってわけだ。初めからずっとな」
languages.original_text: "So in the end..." {n}Marazhai's smile is not his usual triumphant and scornful one. He looks almost tired.{/n} "In the end, I was right about Yremeryss and the mon-keigh. I was right all along."

traits.locale_text: 「で、結局は…」{n}マラズハイの笑顔は、いつもの勝ち誇り、軽蔑するようなものとは異なっていた。少し疲れているように見える。{/n}「結局は、イレメリスとモン＝ケイについては、俺の言ってることが正しかったってわけだ。初めからずっとな」

languages.text: "Letztlich also ..."{n}, Marazhais Lächeln ist nicht wie üblich triumphal und voller Verachtung, er sieht fast erschöpft aus,{/n} "letztlich hatte ich recht, was Yremeryss und die Chem-Pan-Sey angeht. Ich hatte die ganze Zeit über recht."
languages.original_text: "So in the end..." {n}Marazhai's smile is not his usual triumphant and scornful one. He looks almost tired.{/n} "In the end, I was right about Yremeryss and the mon-keigh. I was right all along."

traits.locale_text: "Und letztlich ..." {n}Marazhais Lächeln ist nicht wie üblich triumphal und voller Verachtung. Es ist schon fast müde.{/n} "Und letztlich hatte ich recht, was Yremeryss und die Chem-Pan-Sey angeht. Ich hatte die ganze Zeit über recht."

languages.text: “原来是这样……”{n}玛拉斋的笑容不像平时那样轻蔑、得意，他的表情看起来几乎有些疲惫。{/n}“原来我对伊芮梅莉斯和猴子的怀疑都是对的，原来我的怀疑一直都是对的。”
languages.original_text: "So in the end..." {n}Marazhai's smile is not his usual triumphant and scornful one. He looks almost tired.{/n} "In the end, I was right about Yremeryss and the mon-keigh. I was right all along."

traits.locale_text: “原来是这样……”{n}玛拉斋的笑容不像平时那样轻蔑、得意，他的笑容看起来很疲惫。{/n}“原来我对伊芮梅莉斯和猴子的怀疑都是对的，原来我的怀疑一直都是对的。”

languages.text: "En nihayetinde..." {n}Marazhai'ın yüzünde her zamanki gibi memnuniyet değil, öfkeli bir gülümseme var. Yorgun gözüküyor.{/n} "En nihayetinde Yremeryss ve mon-keighler hakkında yanılmıyormuşum. Başından beri haklıymışım."
languages.original_text: "So in the end..." {n}Marazhai's smile is not his usual triumphant and scornful one. He looks almost tired.{/n} "In the end, I was right about Yremeryss and the mon-keigh. I was right all along."
